entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gravenhurst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:24 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 02:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -2.1°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -6.9°C
Wind: E 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow changing to ice pellets late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 4 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to a few flurries after midnight. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 late in the evening. Temperature rising to plus 4 in the evening then falling. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
